name: Floppy Duck
description:
DISCLAIMER : For better visual quality play in fullscreen!

CONTROLS

Jumping

  • Mouse Left Click
  • Space
  • W Key
  • Up Arrow

Restarting

  • Mouse Right Click
  • R Key

Floppy Duck is a rip-off of "Flappy Bird", it's worse than the original, but I learned what not to do for my next project😅.  Plus I now have a "game" under my belt, That's all. Thanks for checking out my page!
